sn51.23:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.23:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
